assets.title: Logging
assets.raw:
import logging

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
logger.setLevel(logging.DEBUG)

formatter = logging.Formatter('%(asctime)s:%(name)s:%(message)s')

file_handler = logging.FileHandler('sample.log')
file_handler.setLevel(logging.ERROR)
file_handler.setFormatter(formatter)

stream_handler = logging.StreamHandler()
stream_handler.setFormatter(formatter)

logger.addHandler(file_handler)
logger.addHandler(stream_handler)

annotations.text: Set logging for debug level along with file name and output to a `sample.log` file. From The Pieces Python Collection.

assets.title: SQL Query for Filtering Meetings by Date
assets.raw:
table start_time as "Start Time", end_time as "End Time", duration as "Duration" from "Meetings"
where date(date) = date(<% tp.file.title %>)

annotations.text: This code snippet creates a table called "start_time" with columns for start and end time, and duration. The date of the file is equal to its title or greater than it's specified by an expression in each column
Retrieve start time, end time, and duration of meetings filtered by a specific date.
